caption.p: Diagrammatic representation of the influenza A virus (IAV) and its viral genome. Eight internal ssRNA segments encode the major viral proteins of: the RNA-dependent RNA polymerase (PB2, PB1 and PA); HA providing the structural basis for host binding and viral entry; NA facilitating viral release, the binding viral NP; RNA Segment 7 (M) encoding the matrix scaffolding protein (M1) and membrane protein (M2); RNA Segment 8 (NS) encoding a non-structural protein and NEP.
